questions.question: Which HTML element is used to define the title of a webpage?
What is the purpose of the `<head>` element in HTML?
options: It contains metadata and links to external resources like CSS and JavaScript.
It defines the main content of the webpage.
It provides the title of the webpage.
It contains the footer content of the webpage.
questions.answer: It contains metadata and links to external resources like CSS and JavaScript.

questions.question: Which HTML element is used to create a hyperlink?
How do you create a numbered list in HTML?
What is the correct HTML element for inserting an image?
Which attribute is used to specify the source of an image in HTML?
What does the `<form>` element do in HTML?
options: It defines an HTML form for user input.
It creates a container for other elements.
It defines a section of the webpage.
questions.answer: It defines an HTML form for user input.

questions.question: Which HTML element is used to define a table?
How do you define a table row in HTML?
Which HTML element is used to define a table header?
How do you specify a class for an HTML element?
What is the purpose of the `<meta>` tag in HTML?
options: To provide metadata about the HTML document.
To define the main content of the webpage.
To set the background color of the page.
questions.answer: To provide metadata about the HTML document.

questions.question: Which element is used to define a block of code in HTML?
What is the purpose of the `<iframe>` element in HTML?
options: To embed another HTML page within the current page.
To define a section of content.
To create a form for user input.
To insert a video into the page.
questions.answer: To embed another HTML page within the current page.
